This unique item is priced at $750,000, which I believe offers an excellent opportunity for both parties involved. I understand its significance to you and am confident it will serve you well. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
